If you have decided to communicate via IRC, you'll need for this specialized client, nowadays they are sufficient, but in this article I want to tell you about AdiIRC. This client comes with servers and support for working with plug-ins that can greatly extend the default function. After you download and quick installation, run the program in front of us right window appears with the details for connecting to the server, you can leave everything as it is, and you can change your nickname, select one of the available servers and connection port.
Note that AdiIRC program will not only communicate with users on a given server, but you can also share files with them, thanks to the support DDC protocol. If you wish, you can immediately open multiple server and then switch between them as a switch between tabs in the browser. The client is built a large number of servers to communicate, you can add your if desired.
If you are already familiar with this type of program, the whole deal and this will be able to without problems. You can configure the client to automatically switch to the channel if there was a communication gap, you can set different alarm sounds to events.
I note that AdiIRC program is not the most well-known among peers, but it does not mean nothing, believe me, settings and all chips here is enough, so I can recommend it to work with the IRC, at least can it just to experience in and already make their own conclusions.
